content: **knitted vest in drops lima or drops merino extra fine the piece is worked top down with lace pattern sizes xs - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #maplewhispervest drops design pattern li-201 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs s m l xl xxl xxxl **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 300-300-350-400-400-450-500 g colour 9024 almond or use drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 300-300-350-400-400-450-500 g colour 51 double latte **needles** drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 26 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 4 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm 21 stitches in width and 26 row in height with pattern on needle size 4 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
